doc:
Alan Reed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Reed 0 Alan Reed (born Herbert Theodore Bergman; August 20, 1907 – June 14, 1977) was an American actor and voice actor, best known as the original voice of Fred Flintstone on The Flintstones and various spinoff series. He also appeared in many films, including Days of Glory, The Tarnished Angels, Breakfast at Tiffany's, Viva Zapata! (as Pancho Villa), and Nob Hill, and various television series. Alan_Reed ( born Herbert_Theodore_Bergman ; August_20_,_1907 – June_14_,_1977 ) was an_American_actor_and_voice_actor , best_known as the_original_voice of Fred_Flintstone on The_Flintstones and various_spinoff_series . He also appeared in many_films , including Days of Glory , The_Tarnished_Angels , Breakfast at Tiffany 's , Viva Zapata ! ( as Pancho_Villa_) , and Nob_Hill , and various_television_series .
